nodes.bodyText: Did you also look into using constructor injection for injecting the ReadyService into the registries?
No, I didn't want to mess with that in that PR as it can easily be a bigger refactoring. That's imho rather something for after the release.
I can imagine that, but if you had already given it a try and it didn't work out well... then your insights on this might help if someone else looks into it one day. 🙂
